name: ProjectX - Demo Mac
description:
A First Person Shooter and Maze Runner game for Mac OS

Controls

WASD Move

LMB Fire

Z Un-equip weapon (Note: Only one weapon can be equipped at a time.To equip a new weapon drop the current weapon(if available) by pressing Z and then equip new weapon)

Space Jump

RMB IronSight Aim(Rifle only)
